name: XWUI Tour Component
description: Step-by-step guide/tour component for onboarding and feature discovery. Displays a series of steps highlighting different parts of the interface. Supports mask overlay, custom placements, and navigation. Uses XWUIPortal internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

target.description: Target element or selector string to highlight

placement.description: Placement of the step popover relative to target

mask.description: Whether to show mask overlay highlighting target

scrollIntoViewOptions.description: Options for scrolling target into view

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the tour

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

open.description: Whether the tour is currently open
